attributes.action: reopen the Waverley route railway between Carlisle and Edinburgh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Waverley route between Carlisle and Edinburgh closed in 1969 removing the rail service from the Borders.  Although reopening  Edinburgh -Galashiels is being considered services should continue south towards Carlisle, reinstating a direct rail link to London. This will increase capacity for freight as existing routes are reach capacity. Reintoducing through services Edinburgh - St. Pancras will allow for an additional rail franchise (St. Pancras - Edinburgh), and will increase both capacity and choice for rail customers.
